USE_TEXTURES

ENABLE_WIREFRAME_MODE

public static final Option ENABLE_WIREFRAME_MODE
Whether or not to render in only wireframe (GL_LINE) mode.

ERROR_CHECK

public static final Option ERROR_CHECK
Whether the graphic card should be checked for errors on every call. if there is an error then an exception will be thrown.

TRACE

public static final Option TRACE
Whether or not we should turn on the lowest level of graphics card tracing. Very expensive.

GL_EXP2

public static final Option GL_EXP2
Whether or not OpenGL's second exponential fog algorithm (GL_EXP2) should be used instead of its first exponential fog algorithm (GL_EXP) in the rendering of exponential fog.

OPTIONS

public static final Option[] OPTIONS
Array containing all valid OptionS.

Method Detail

toString

public String toString()
Returns the name of this option

Returns:
the name of this Option

getOrdinal

public int getOrdinal()
Returns the ordinal of this option. The ordinal is an integer which represents the order in which the Option objects were instantiated this will not change during a virtual machine session however it is not guarenteed to remain constant the next time it is instantiated or between software versions. For this reason this method SHOULD NEVER BE USED outside the RenderOptions class.

Returns:
the ordinal of this Option

isBooleanOption

public boolean isBooleanOption()
Returns true if this option is a boolean true|false option. Variable options will return false;

Returns:
a boolean representing whether this option is represented by a boolean.

getDefaultValue

public float getDefaultValue()
Returns the default value of this option as a float.

Returns:
the default value of this option as a float.

isDefaultSetByProperty

public boolean isDefaultSetByProperty()
Returns true if the default value for this option was overwriten at runtime (eg. -DXITH3D_USE_LIGHTING=false).

Returns:
true if the default value for this option was overwriten at runtime.

getLastOrdinal

public static int getLastOrdinal()
Returns the highest ordinal of all OptionS.

Returns:
the highest ordinal of all OptionS.
